name: My Riding Stables: Life with Horses 2
name_original: My Riding Stables: Life with Horses 2
description:
Create your very own stud farm! As the owner of an old horse farm you restore stables, riding hall and guest house to their previous glory. Soon your guests will be so thrilled they'll make your farm a favourite destination for horse riding fans. In your breeding stables you take very good care of your cute foals, which spend most of their time frolicking in the fields. As soon as they are old enough you train your foals on the longe and sell them to trustworthy horse enthusiasts.

Step by step you'll expand your horse farm. Take your time spoiling your horses by grooming, massaging showering them and scraping out their hooves. Relax with extensive excursions on the countryside or on a number of racetracks. Master extended canter and the most challenging jumps. Prove your excellent riding skills time and time at exciting tournaments. Every trophy you win will make your stable more famous and renowned.

It's never been so much fun learning the ropes of horse breeding! Create your own horse farm with the world's best breeds.FEATURES:
  • Create an extensive horse farm with stables, riding hall, guest house, therapy centre, fields and challenging racetracks.
  • Breed cute foals (100+ possible combinations).
  • Train your horses on the longe.
  • Spoil your horses by grooming, massaging showering them and scraping out their hooves.
  • Show your skills on challenging cross country courses.
  • Ride in extended canter and master the most challenging jumps on 9 tracks and cross country courses.
  • Exciting horse races in stunningly beautiful nature.
  • Manage your horse farm like a true master and breed the best horses far and wide.
